thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Really lovely hotel!
thread.title_full: Really lovely hotel! - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kian K
title: Really lovely hotel!
text:
My girlfriend took me to Paris this weekend for my birthday and we stayed here and we were not disappointed! The building was clean and neat and had lovely art all with nice decor inside. Our room had an amazing view of the roundabout outside, with a view of the beautiful buildings and cafes. We enjoyed the big TV also!
The staff were great and very friendly, one member of staff even tried to help me resolve an issue with my Wi-Fi on my laptop!
The only criticism I have is that the Wi-Fi in our room wasn't very reliable and kept cutting out at random times, forcing me to use 3G on my phone, but apart from that no major issues!
Thank you for having us, we'll be back!
